entry.summary:

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 70%
